trans-unit.source: Contains a serialized version of the original token that was used at sign-in time.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una versión serializada del token original que se utilizó en el momento del inicio de sesión

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext" />.

trans-unit.source: An array that represents the token.
trans-unit.target: Matriz que representa el token.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext" /> class by using the specified array.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext" /> usando la matriz especificada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the token.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que representa el token.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext" /> class by using the specified string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext" /> con la cadena especificada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Datos serializados.

trans-unit.source: The context for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Contexto para la serialización.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext" /> class from a stream.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext" /> a partir de una secuencia.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="info" /> is **null**.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> es **NULL**.

trans-unit.source: The security token to serialize.
trans-unit.target: Token de seguridad que se va a serializar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext" /> class by using the specified security token and token handler.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext" /> usando el token de seguridad y controlador de token especificados.

trans-unit.source: The token handler is not used to deserialize the token because it cannot be assumed to exist at the time when the token is deserialized.
trans-unit.target: El controlador de token no se utiliza para deserializar el token porque no se da por hecho que existe en el momento cuando se deserializa el token.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="tokenHandler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tokenHandler" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que se va a rellenar con datos.

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Destino de esta serialización.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Puede ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Populates the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with data needed to serialize the current <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Rellena el objeto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> con los datos necesarios para serializar el objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="info" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the security token that was used to initialize the context.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el token de seguridad usado para inicializar el contexto.

trans-unit.source: The security token or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Token de seguridad o <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is only set if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor was used; otherwise it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad se establece solo si la <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor se utiliza; de lo contrario, es `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the token handler that was used to initialize the context.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el controlador del token usado para inicializar el contexto.

trans-unit.source: The token handler or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El controlador de token o <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is only set if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor was used; otherwise it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad se establece solo si la <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor se utiliza; de lo contrario, es `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that was used to initialize the context.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la cadena que se usó para inicializar el contexto.

trans-unit.source: The string that was used to initialize the context or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: La cadena que se usa para inicializar el contexto o <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is only set if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor was used; otherwise it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad se establece solo si la <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor se utiliza; de lo contrario, es `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the array that was used to initialize the context.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la matriz usada para inicializar el contexto.

trans-unit.source: The array that was used to initialize the context or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: La matriz usada para inicializar el contexto o <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is only set if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor was used; otherwise it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad se establece solo si la <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext.%23ctor%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor se utiliza; de lo contrario, es `null`.
